channel.title: [PI] Item help [PI]
channel.description:
This made me wtf.. I just created a Donator shop, It sells party hats but when I try to buy one it says "This Item costs 0 Points" I checked every other shop and they would say "This item costs 187800 (187K)" Someone please help me with this, how do I change it so people can buy the donator only Party hats with cash, not points..
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Item help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

ShopAssistant.

Look for ‘points’
It applys to all shops 17+ so you are going to need to change the methods that use ‘points’ or change the shop number.

Read full topic
